ProductInfo.Features:
Miniature wireless color camera that operates on AC or DC power.
4-channel receiver is selectable and amtches with the camera to find the best frequency to transmit the video and over over.
9-volt battery operation (battery not included).
Easy connection to TV, VCR, DVR PC with converter card.
Portable and convenient observation.
ProductInfo.Name: Swann S231-SCK Wireless Safety Security Camera Kit
